ipv6.dstAddr = ff02:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/16 : fwd(36);
ipv6.dstAddr = ff02:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/16 : fwd(37);
ipv6.dstAddr = 9001:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0001/128 : fwd(37);
ipv6.dstAddr = 9001:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0002/128 : fwd(36);
ipv6.dstAddr = 9001:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0003/128 and stful.color = 0: fwd(37);
ipv6.dstAddr = 9001:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0003/128 and stful.color = 1: fwd(36);
